About Us

Mark Quirvien Cristobal

Vhin

Opposite his bubbly bride is the quiet and reserved Mark Quirvien aka "Vhin". Born in Obando Bulacan and raised in Valenzuela City by his parents, Ricardo and Florinda Cristobal. Youngest among 3 siblings and being the only son, his family is relatively protective of him.

Despite that, Vhin never disappoints his parents, being responsible when he was still a student in STI College and proven more of his worth when he worked in different companies including NSO. He then gained enough experience to apply for a job in Singapore where his whole family was residing.

The timing was perfect since the said Country is in dire need of IT standouts from Philippines. Vhin got the job and after 2 years working in, he transferred to Mediacorp, a media mogul in Singapore where only smart computer geeks are hired. Yes, he is a self-confessed geek and most of his friends are aware.

To bring out the cool side of Vhin, he plays the guitar in his "punk rock band", surfs the net most often reading memes, is addicted to computer games and likes photography.

Someday his dream is to create his own video game which will go viral around the globe, and with this discipline and perseverance, the possibility of it is in the near future.

His personality compliments his bride; sweet, generous and funny. The perfect ingredients in creating a perfect husband.

Richelle Lyn Rivamonte

Rich

Richelle Rivamonte fondly known as "Rich" to her family and friends, is born in Valenzuela city on Mar. 20, 1985. She is the eldest among 4 siblings and also the only rose among the thorns in her family. Early in her life, she was taught how to be responsible and how to be a role model to her 3 younger brothers Michael, Jobert & Gelo.

She centers her life in her family and has taken over the role of a provider along with her dad, Pedrito Rivamonte to sustain their daily needs and help her brothers' education. That is why she took up Nursing and as soon as she qualified working abroad after working two years in Fatima Medical Hospital, she flew to Singapore in search of a greener pasture. All her hard work will soon pay off as this lady is very passionate about her craft and she never fails to share her blessing especially to her family. She will do everything for her loved ones, including her friends.

She is known to extend a helping hand in anyone who is in need. For she is naturally kind-hearted and caring. She is loved by all. Her family, friends, colleagues and of course, her boyfriend who is now her husband.

Everyone knows how kind and thoughtful she is, but what some people don't know is that this petite girl is actually a big eater and an even bigger cry baby! She cries about anything! Sad stories, love songs and even happy movies! She is quite the sensitive girl in her group and there are times she gets teased because of it. She even won the "Drama Queen" award in her workplace.

No matter what happens, Rich will never be alone in her life, for she will always have her family, her friends and her husband Mark.
